meta.content: Theater; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of June 16 theater review of Macbeth

block.p: A theater review of ''Macbeth'' in Weekend on Friday misidentified the director and misstated the year of a Royal Shakespeare Company production of ''All's Well That Ends Well'' on Broadway. It was directed in 1983 by Trevor Nunn, not in 1984 by Terry Hands (the director of the current ''Macbeth'').
The review also misidentified the play that the company presented on Broadway in repertory with ''Cyrano de Bergerac'' in 1984. It was ''Much Ado About Nothing,'' not ''All's Well That Ends Well.''

A theater review of ''Macbeth'' in Weekend on Friday misidentified the director and misstated the year of a Royal Shakespeare Company production of ''All's Well That Ends Well'' on Broadway. It was directed in 1983 by Trevor Nunn, not in 1984 by Terry Hands (the director of the current ''Macbeth'').
The review also misidentified the play that the company presented on Broadway in repertory with ''Cyrano de Bergerac'' in 1984. It was ''Much Ado About Nothing,'' not ''All's Well That Ends Well.''
